comment._content:
Another Bain/LOC portrait of Russell Millward:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5740522002/in/photostream/]

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Russell Hastings Millward (b. 1877).  In December 1913 the New York Times was reporting his cables from Belize (he was in Central America to chart the Department of Pelen, Guatemala).  Fellow of the Royal Geographical Society, life member of the New York Zoological Society and the American Museum of Natural History.

comment.author: 34911459@N08
comment._content: pennylrichardsca: thanks for the additional information on Russell Millward.  We may add the information to the source data.
